name: Slam Jam!
description:
Slam Jam is an 8-bit multiplayer shooter where two berries are pit against each other in a fight to the death! Choose from 3 unique firing types and jump into the battleground! Fly between platforms while firing as many berry-bullets as you can! Collect Power-ups to better your advantage but watch out for those pesky bombs! Use physics to your advantage to throw the other player across the level and pin them to walls for maximum damage! Jam out to the original 8-bit OTS!

Gifs!
